name: Pucman Worlds
overview: Game design by Petri Häkkinen and Olli Hänninen-Pelz. Coding in AMOS by Petri Häkkinen. Graphics by Olli Hänninen-Pelz. Music/sound FX by Petri Häkkinen. Game includes a map editor allowing players to create their own levels. Pucman Worlds is a collect-and-avoid maze game inspired by Pac-Man, written in AMOS and released Christmas 1994.
